metadata.title: CVE-2019-9892 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 5.x through5.0.34, 6.x through 6.0.17, and 7.x through 7.0.6. An attacker who islogged into OTRS as an agent user with appropriate permissions may try toimport carefully crafted Report Statistics XML that will result in readingof arbitrary files on the OTRS filesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9892` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.18-1
otrs2 - 6.0.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.18-1').
